name: EDD Quaderno
author: Quaderno

sections.description:
Quaderno for EDD takes taxes off your plate by automatically calculating tax on every sale and following up with beautiful invoices, no matter where your customer is located. Transactions and invoices processed through Quaderno always comply with ever-changing local tax rules, including in the US, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, India, United Kingdom, and the European Union.

What you get

  • Comply with local tax laws in countries around the world, including the EU VAT OSS for digital products.
  • Get notified any time you surpass a tax threshold, or when a tax rate changes anywhere you sell your products.
  • Get all the information you need for your tax returns, at a glance, in mere seconds.
  • Automatic invoices, and credit notes with every order and refund in your store, in multiple languages and currencies.
  • Manage all your revenue sources in one easy-to-use dashboard.

Setup in less than 5 minutes. Fast and easy!

  1. Download & activate this plugin
  2. Sign up for a Quaderno account
  3. Paste your API key in your EDD site
  4. That’s all!

Please Note: this plugin requires a Quaderno account.
sections.installation:
Following are the steps to install the EDD Quaderno

  1. Unpack the entire contents of this plugin zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder locally.
  2. Upload to your site.
  3. Navigate to wp-admin/plugins.php on your site (your WP Admin plugin page).
  4. Activate this plugin.
  5. Configure the options from Downloads > Settings > Quaderno.

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins > Add New > and type this plugin’s name

That’s it! You can now customize your EDD invoices and be tax compliant wordlwide.
sections.faq:
Do I need to modify any code?

Nope – we take care of everything you. Just install the plugin, add your API token and you’ll be good to go!

Does Quaderno work with any themes?

Yes, Quaderno works with any theme – whether free, commercial or custom. You just need EDD activated for Quaderno to work.

If you have any questions please get in touch with us at support@quaderno.io.

sections.reviews:
Quaderno Has Worked Great!

By edwarvel on April 19, 2023

I was pleasantly surprised at how well this app works. It was easy to set up and use. The platform is laid out well, and most importantly it works great. The reports are amazing and it makes submitting taxes easy. And it is affordable. I use another tax collecting app on another website that can't compare. That one is extremely expensive, the connector don't work with the plugin, and trying to get help was a nightmare. I wasted so much time. I really appreciate Quaderno for making my job easier. Their support is also amazing.

Great !

By Paul (paulpow) on January 25, 2021

Quaderno is very easy to use and to pair with EDD. Support is helpful and reactive. Thank you !

Love it!

By Brett Porcelli (bporcelli) on January 3, 2020

By far the easiest way to automate tax compliance and invoices for EDD with excellent support to boot.

Awesome plugin and awesome support

By Kuba Mikita (Kubitomakita) on December 12, 2018

I've been the worst client asking a ton of question before even purchasing the service. Support was very helpful, they resolved a couple of bugs I found in no time. If you are hesitating and thinking if this is for you - don't do my mistake. I should've gone for Quaderno the day I start my shop and I'd certainly save a lot o headache!

A must have plugin for EDD

By calumallison on July 31, 2018

Switched from Taxamo to Quaderno to make our site compliant with EU Tax laws as the Quaderno integration with EDD is so much better than Taxamo. Definitely recommend using Quaderno if you sell to EU customers. Support is very responsive as well! Thanks for making it easy to be tax compliant!

Excellent!

By flowdee on March 1, 2018

For me Quaderno right now is the best solution for automated tax and invoice handling when using Easy Digital Downloads. So happy I finally moved over to Quaderno!

An essential plugin for EDD

By Steve Henty (stevehenty) on March 5, 2017

After six months of research and testing I couldn't find any other way to comply 100% with all the EU regulations. By implementing Quaderno I was able to get everything working perfectly and in the process remove 3 other premium plugins from different developers. Most importantly, the team at Quaderno is very knowledgeable and extremely helpful. I've found it's fully compatible with all the EDD extensions I have installed including Recurring Payments, Software Licensing and Stripe and PayPal gateways.

The best option for invoices in UE

By Raúl González (ragose) on September 3, 2016

Thanks to Quaderno I can have a fully automated billing system with Easy Digital Downloads in my WordPress website.

I save a lot of time in the monthly billing, including European tax problems.

Now I can focus on my business, because it's what interests me.

Thanks very much Quaderno!

short_description: Automatically calculate tax rates & create instant tax reports for your Easy Digital Downloads store. Setup in less than 5 minutes.
description:
Quaderno for EDD takes taxes off your plate by automatically calculating tax on every sale and following up with beautiful invoices, no matter where your customer is located. Transactions and invoices processed through Quaderno always comply with ever-changing local tax rules, including in the US, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, India, United Kingdom, and the European Union.

  • Comply with local tax laws in countries around the world, including the EU VAT OSS for digital products.
  • Get notified any time you surpass a tax threshold, or when a tax rate changes anywhere you sell your products.
  • Get all the information you need for your tax returns, at a glance, in mere seconds.
  • Automatic invoices, and credit notes with every order and refund in your store, in multiple languages and currencies.
  • Manage all your revenue sources in one easy-to-use dashboard.

Setup in less than 5 minutes. Fast and easy!

  1. Download & activate this plugin
  2. Sign up for a Quaderno account
  3. Paste your API key in your EDD site
  4. That’s all!

2.caption: Paste it on the Quaderno settings page
